doc.title: Yeochang
doc.plot: Turning 20 years old, a translator decides to give fate a helping hand in finding her true love. She decides to stop the seventh car that passes her and seduce the driver in the hope that he will fall in love with her. Her plan works to a point, but she learns that the man she seduces is already married. Dissappointed, but not discouraged, she tries again, this time selecting the third car that passes.
